title: Holiday Stories Redux #2
description:
Our second look back at some of our favorite Yuletide tales from the podcast.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Pete Jolly, Brendan Jay Sullivan, Barenaked Ladies, Vin Brue, V/VM, Tom Paxton, Divide and Kreate, The Gasoline Brothers, Decca Concert Orchestra, DC Benny, Joseph Spence, Rend Collective, Elna Baker, Kevin Allison)
